mapper.insert: insert into tb_space (space_id, space_name, baggage_allowance, space_discount) values (#{spaceId},#{spaceName},#{baggageAllowance},#{spaceDiscount});
mapper.select: select ts.space_id,space_name,baggage_allowance,space_discount from tb_model left join tb_mdsp tm on tb_model.model_id = tm.model_id left join tb_space ts on tm.space_id = ts.space_id where tm.model_id = #{modelId};
